title: cant view my own profile!
body: so i was updating my runes and mysteries, then when i close it to see how some of the pros do it it wouldn't let me click on any profile including my own. and i still cannot -,- i think its fixed when i re-log on but its still bothersome{{item:3070}}

replies.body: So is this ever going to get flixed? Still a problem a year later lol

yea this happens to me too man. its really annoying cuz i like to look at the enemy teams profiles after games. but i end up only being able to look at 2 or 3 before it gets bugged out, and then i have to log out and log back in to fix it

To help shed some more light on this bug as this has happened to me twice. This happens when you look at other peoples profiles consecutively or in a fast manner.

This bug can be recreated using one of the following methods:

• Using the Recently Played menu in your friends list, right clicking to view the profiles in order
• Looking at other peoples profiles and switching back to your own quickly
• Switching from one players profile to the next without going back to your own (sometimes it has to be done quickly)

It's a weird bug that stops you from viewing any profiles including your own, stops you from accessing rune pages, masteries and item sets.. You can still press the play button, join a game, go into the store and do all other non profile related things. If you do play a game however, after you get out of the game you still cannot access anything profile related.
i have the same problem please fix
This bug has been a serious issue. 99% Riot won't address this issue unless someone of "importance" mentions it. {{item:3070}}
They're like Steam, don't bother fixing the things that need fixing.  People will give them money despite bugs like this.
How the hell are we 2 years deep on this thread and not a single person from Riot has addressed the issue?!

> [{quoted}](name=Geek,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=0kX8panu,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-13T04:07:19.612+0000)
>
> How the hell are we 2 years deep on this thread and not a single person from Riot has addressed the issue?!

IKR, cant even find any work-arounds on this bug{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
This bug has persistet for as long as I can remember, and I've been playing since launch, so, like, wtf? Is this EVER gonna be adressed?

Any chance ANYONE has looked at this?  I mean, League is supposed to be based on stats, so if I can't see my own stats or the stats of my teammates, am I supposed to keep playing blind?  

Once you relog, you lose all the information about your Recently Played.  Should we buy a pen and a pad of paper and write down the names, Riot?
